First commissioned by the wardens of the prison-planet Daegox 4 and now used in prisons throughout Near Space, the burdening

weapon fusion often bears chains or manacles. When you score a critical hit using a weapon with the burdening fusion, the target gains the encumbered condition for 1d4 rounds. If the weapon already has a critical hit effect, when you score a critical hit, you can  apply either the weaponâ€™s normal critical hit effect or the burdening effect.
